mapper.select: select JS_BankNumber, JS_BankType, JS_BankPassWord, JS_ClientID, JS_BankRemainingSum, JS_BankState, JS_BankPhone, JS_IDNumber from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientBank where JS_BankNumber = #{jsBanknumber}
select JS_BankNumber, JS_BankType, JS_BankPassWord, JS_ClientID, JS_BankRemainingSum, JS_BankState, JS_BankPhone, JS_IDNumber from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientBank limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientBank(JS_BankType, JS_BankPassWord, JS_ClientID, JS_BankRemainingSum, JS_BankState, JS_BankPhone, JS_IDNumber) values (#{jsBanktype}, #{jsBankpassword}, #{jsClientid}, #{jsBankremainingsum}, #{jsBankstate}, #{jsBankphone}, #{jsIdnumber})
mapper.update:
update JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientBank
JS_BankType = #{jsBanktype},
JS_BankPassWord = #{jsBankpassword},
JS_ClientID = #{jsClientid},
JS_BankRemainingSum = #{jsBankremainingsum},
JS_BankState = #{jsBankstate},
JS_BankPhone = #{jsBankphone},
JS_IDNumber = #{jsIdnumber},
where JS_BankNumber = #{jsBanknumber}
